name: Immigration Institute of the Bay Area
description: The International Institute of the Bay Area (IIBA) provides immigration legal services and education for immigrants, refugees, and their families. With eight offices throughout the Bay Area, IIBA helps immigrants obtain stable immigration status in the United States.
fullDescription: The International Institute of the Bay Area (IIBA) provides immigration legal services and education for immigrants, refugees, and their families. With eight offices throughout the Bay Area, IIBA helps immigrants obtain stable immigration status in the United States.
